remarks: Define the limit ordinal predicate, which is true for a nonempty ordinal that is not a successor (i.e. that is the union of itself).  Our definition combines the definition of Lim of [BellMachover] p. 471 and Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 42.  See ~ dflim2 , ~ dflim3 , and dflim4 for alternate definitions.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-1994.)
statement: df-lim $p |- ( Lim A <-> ( Ord A /\ A =/= (/) /\ A = U. A ) ) $.
